short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy access to security tools and useful links. Overrides the newtab with funsafetabsearch.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fun Safe Tab Search - Secure and Customizable New Tab Extension

Transform your new tab experience with Fun Safe Tab! This extension enhances your browsing by providing a range of tools to secure your files and check domain safety using the Safe Browsing service. Enjoy a customizable new tab with the ability to change backgrounds, and access several useful links directly from your new tab page.

Features:

File Security Tools: Secure your files with built-in tools designed to keep your data safe.

Domain Safety Check: Verify if domains are secure using the Safe Browsing service, ensuring a safer browsing experience.

Customizable Backgrounds: Personalize your new tab with a variety of background options.

Useful Links: Access essential and frequently used links right from your new tab.

Experience a new level of security and customization with Fun Safe Tab Search!

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing "FunSafeTab" extension and setting new tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. search results will be powered by Yahoo.


Privacy policy: https://funsafetabsearch.com/privacy.php
Terms and conditions: https://funsafetabsearch.com/license_agreement.php
